WELCOME.TITLE2: provides a portfolio of network management applications run as dedicated per-user instances in the cloud.
WELCOME.P1: GÉANT’s NMaaS service includes three aspects: providing, managing and maintaining the infrastructure of the NMaaS service portal, platform and selected tools, supporting users in using the system, and the selected tools for monitoring their networks via NMaaS, as well as supporting users that contribute their software to NMaaS system.
WELCOME.P3: NMaaS users are organisations that do not want to own NMS infrastructure themselves and/or want to outsource network management, as well as organisations and/or individuals that are searching for quality network management software or who want to share their software within the community.
WELCOME.P5: NMaaS Marketplace is a catalogue of available open source tools, supported by community, distributed free, chosen by administration. There is also place for your application choice - you can propose new applications.
WELCOME.P7: With NMaaS, users do not have to bear the ownership costs and risks related to maintenance and control of the network management infrastructure.
WELCOME.P9: If You need some horizontal scaling - there is no problem with that on NMaaS. You can very easily scale Your instances in few minutes.
WELCOME.P12: At store You can find top picked applications to manage and maintain Your network infrastructure, chosen by administrators and community.
WELCOME.P14: You want to share your application among the community? You can request adding your application to NMaaS Application Market.
WELCOME.P16: If you want to login using same account for few services, not only NMaasS, You can login using SSO, where you can choose your identity provider and login using existing account.
WELCOME.P18: You can deploy your first application in few minutes - just add your configuration, get application from Market and deploy it - our services will do rest. In few minutes you will get address for your instance of application.
WELCOME.P20: NMaaS gives You solution for service monitoring - with our service tool, You can check and collect information about your services availability.
WELCOME.P22: You have more then one domain to manage, but you don't have own infrastructure? There is simple solution - NMaaS support multiple domains and configurations to manage.
WELCOME.P25: With NMaaS, you don't have to worry about security. We provide safe connection to separated instances by VPN to your network - to allow institutions and projects to safe management of network.

REGISTRATION.THANK_YOU_MESSAGE: Thank you for submitting the registration form. Your account needs to be enabled by the system administrator. This make take some time.
